3.0.name: wordpress/plugin-romanian-tv-online-cu-poze-widget-tv-online-romania
3.0.description:
RO: Cu ajutorul acestui plugin puteti afisa intr-un widget posturile dumneavoastra preferate. Acest plugin va permite sa alegeti dumneavoastra posturile tv pe care le afisati pe site-ul sau blogul dumneavoastra.

PS: Toate linkurile sunt NOfollow.

EN : This plugin gives you the possibility to display a widget with your favourite TV stations and allows you to choose which TV stations you want to display on your site or blog. PS : All links are NOfollow
